page.title: 16Hopes and Fears
page.content: We have three main fears, one is that there will be a third world war and it will be a nuclear war.If this happens the chances are that we will not survive. Another fear is that we will run out of gas, electricity,oil, coal and petrol.These are our main sources of energy.Our third fear is vandalism.There are already too many vandals. We all hope there will be some good things in the future like interesting jobs.One of the boys would like to be an inventor of robots because inventors often become famous,another a fireman because it would be exciting, one a farmer like his dad.The girls have different ambitions,to be a hairdresser, or work with horses,to nurse young children,to teach or play the flute. We all hope our village will not change.
